name: The North Face TKA Kataka 1/4 Zip Fleece - Women's
description:
This cozy, oversized fleece is just the thing for catching a sunset on the beach. The soft recycled polyester fleece helps ward off chilly sea breezes, and it makes getting to and from the camp fire a lot more comfortable.High-collar and ¼ zip make temperature regulation easy.Woven reinforcement on the back of the sleeves.Internal drawcord can keep the warmth in, or create a cropped look.Relaxed fit leaves room to layer.

        Sustainability





.st0{stroke:#333;stroke-width:.79;stroke-miterlimit:10}
